Description:
Detects potential token impersonation and theft. Example, when using "DuplicateToken(Ex)" and "ImpersonateLoggedOnUser" with the "LOGON32_LOGON_NEW_CREDENTIALS flag".

Author: Michaela Adams, Zach Mathis
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Access Token Abuse
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '4624' and logontype = '9' and logonprocessname = 'advapi' and authenticationpackagename = 'negotiate' and impersonationlevel = '%%1833'
